author.email: nicklothian at users dot sourceforge dot net

section.name: Download Classifer4J
section.p: Classifier4J can be downloaded from Sourceforge.

There are a number of options for downloading Classifier4J (in all cases, substitute ??? for the correction version number):
The Classifier4J-???.jar release package contains just the Classifier4J binaries.
The Classifier4J-Optional-???.jar release package contains the Classifier4J-Optional binaries.
Classifier4J-???-dist.zip contains everthing needed to build Classifier4J.
